Text:
If anyone needs me to seed please email me at sparky (at) theneitherworld.com

I don't check the comments here often. :)

Sparky, I've got the ACTUAL stereo LP soundtrack and am working on getting it ripped and cleaned up.   I plan on having it ready and on the web early this coming week -- I'll email you when it's done.

-- Vinnie Rattolle
